dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Notice of Claimed Infringement - http://american-ladies.org]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, April 18, 2005 11:23 AM
To: leskelly@leskelly.cnc.net
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Notice of Claimed Infringement -
http://american-ladies.org]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Notice of Claimed Infringement - http://american-ladies.org
Date: Mon, 18 Apr 2005 06:05:11 -0700
From: Leslie A. Kelly <leskelly@leskelly.cnc.net>
Reply-To: copyright@theplanet.com
To: abuse@theplanet.com
CC: american_ladies@bellsouth.net, alexkd4hfy@charter.net,
geojudy@bellsouth.net
References: <424E248F.3080808@leskelly.cnc.net>

NOTICE OF CLAIMED INFRINGEMENT

Les Kelly Enterprises
15802 Springdale Street, Suite 14
Huntington Beach, CA 92649-1765
(714) 846-0437 FAX (714) 846-8858
E-mail: leskelly@concentric.net

Sunday, April 17, 2005

DESIGNATED AGENT TO RECEIVE NOTICE OF CLAIMED INFRINGEMENT

Lance Crosby, Esq.
Chief Operating Officer
ThePlanet.com Internet Services
1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207

Facsimile Number of Designated Agent: 214.782.7756 E-Mail Address of
Designated Agent: copyright@theplanet.com

Notice of Copyright Infringement/DMCA Take Down Demand per 17 USC 512(c)
Your Client: http://american-ladies.org 70.85.1.130 Judy Overzet, 737 Wylie
Drive, Brighton, TN 38011 Sub-Client of Ms. Overzet: Lois S. Alexander,
http://slidesworld.american-ladies.org/amishpeopleindex.html
http://slidesworld.american-ladies.org/buggybig.jpg
http://slidesworld.american-ladies.org/amishpeople2.html (scrolling applet)
http://slidesworld.american-ladies.org/amishpeople3.html (scrolling applet)
http://scd.mm-b.yimg.com/image/1457068313

Your Client: http://theartistnest.net 70.85.1.130 Judy Overzet, 737 Wylie
Drive, Brighton, TN 38011 This website seems to be the main host system for
http://slidesworld.american-ladies.org as they have the same DNS
70.85.1.130. It is also the website at which Ms. Overzet posts information
about web hosting and web design. She recently removed some fee information
for hosting and webdesign but I have it saved on PDF and can provide as
requested.

Dear Mr. Crosby:

Your client, http://www.american-ladies.org, who has just recently switched
over service to ThePlanet.com, as their webhost and ISP, has infringed one
copyright registered image with three uses in a commercial website for which
she acts as host, by creating or using an illegal derivative, for which I am
creator and registered copyright owner of the original. At the end of this
legal notice, I have attached a copy of a takedown notice responded to and
executed by Everyone's Internet, Ltd., 390 Brenmar Drive, Suite 200,
Houston, TX 77060  [DMCA
#04012005-2300-7480]: Your Case Number 5134 [Re: Abuse complaint regarding
the server located at [64.246.22.68] Our Case Number: 5134]

As required by US Copyright Law at 17 USC 512(c)(3), I am providing the
following statement for a Takedown Demand based on DMCA:

(3) Elements of Notification.-

(A) To be effective under this subsection, a notification of claimed
infringement must be a written communication provided to the designated
agent of a service provider that includes substantially the following:

(i) A physical or electronic signature of a person authorized to act on
behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

My name is Leslie A. Kelly, President, Les Kelly Enterprises. You may verify
my authority by visiting http://netcopyrightlaw.com. I am FAXing a signed
copy of this e-mail to 214.782.7756.

(ii) Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed,
or, if multiple copyrighted works at a single online site are covered by a
single notification, a representative list of such works at that site.

Amish buggy with Amish family going to church.
http://american-ladies.org
http://slidesworld.american-ladies.org/amishpeopleindex.html
http://slidesworld.american-ladies.org/buggybig.jpg
http://slidesworld.american-ladies.org/amishpeople2.html (scrolling applet
Slideshow 1, first image)
http://slidesworld.american-ladies.org/amishpeople3.html (scrolling applet
Slideshow 2, first image)

The copyright registered image appears at the following URLs:
http://amish.net
http://amish.net/images/buggy1.jpg
http://amish.net/images/buggybig.jpg

(iii) Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing or to
be the subject of infringing activity and that is to be removed or access to
which is to be disabled, and information reasonably sufficient to permit the
service provider to locate the material.


Amish buggy with Amish family going to church.
http://slidesworld.american-ladies.org
http://slidesworld.american-ladies.org/amishpeopleindex.html
http://slidesworld.american-ladies.org/buggybig.jpg
http://slidesworld.american-ladies.org/amishpeople2.html (scrolling applet
Slideshow 1, first image)
http://slidesworld.american-ladies.org/amishpeople3.html (scrolling applet
Slideshow 2, first image)

The copyright registered image appears at the following URLs:
http://amish.net
http://amish.net/images/buggy1.jpg
http://amish.net/images/buggybig.jpg

(iv) Information reasonably sufficient to permit the service provider to
contact the complaining party, such as an address, telephone number, and, if
available, an electronic mail address at which the complaining party may be
contacted.

Leslie A. Kelly, mailto:leskelly@concentric.net or (714) 846-0437

(v) A statement that the complaining party has a good faith belief that use
of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I affirm that I, Leslie A. Kelly, have a good faith belief that use of the
material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright
owner, its agent, or the law.

(vi) A statement that the information in the notification is accurate, and
under penalty of perjury, that the complaining party is authorized to act on
behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

I affirm that the information in the notification is accurate, and under
penalty of perjury, that the complaining party is authorized to act on
behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely yours,


Leslie A. Kelly
President
Les Kelly Enterprises
NetCopyrightLaw Net Consulting Services
http://netcopyrightlaw.com


X X X X X X X X X X X

Dear Sir or Madam,
 We no longer hosts the domain in question, nor the images.  I've done a
whois on the ip addresses, and pasted it below.

Regards,
Jonathan
Abuse Team
Ev1Servers.net
[DMCA #04012005-2300-7480]: Your Case Number 5134 [Re: Abuse complaint
regarding the server located at [64.246.22.68]  Our Case Number: 5134]

host slidesworld.american-ladies.org
slidesworld.american-ladies.org has address 70.85.1.130 whois 70.85.1.130

additional hints on searching ARIN's WHOIS database.

> and http://slidesworld.american-ladies.org/buggybig.jpg
